alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 5:53PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN FAIRFIELD AND NORTHWESTERN NEW HAVEN COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 552 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monroe, or near Southbury, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waterbury, Shelton, Naugatuck, Southbury, Wolcott, Newtown, Monroe, Seymour, Derby, Prospect, Woodbridge, Middlebury, Beacon Falls, Bethany, and Ansonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
